Title: Can concreteness training buffer against the negative effects of rumination on ptsd? an experimental analogue study

ResultSummary: No group difference on the  intrusion frequency immediate post trauma film reminder measured by intrusion questionnaire between Abstract and Concrete processing style group
Notes_fromMo: Contact author for mean/SD. In this article, they combined lab intrusion questionnaire immediate post film and post trauma film reminder. Here I coded them separately; Also they did not provide the mean/SD for each group, but only have the regression parameters
